page.title: 15A MIXED FARM IN GT BROMLEY
page.content: {Harris Farm}is an{arable}and{pig farm of{86}acres.The farm was built in 1953.The owner has lived there{32}years.On a typical day he gets up and feeds the pigs at 7.30 a.m. Then he cleans them out and gives them fresh straw bedding.After- wards he and his son do the office work and sort out the mail. Then they go out and work in the fields. In the afternoon they feed the pigs again and carry on working until 8.00 p.m.if they are busy.They grow{wheat, {peas, barley}and{potatoes.}They own {41 sows, 2 boars,260 piglets,2 dogs,8 {hens,4 farm cats and 2 house}cats.When the piglets are{5 weeks old}they take the{sow}away. At {10 weeks old}they go into a new pen.When they are{16 weeks {old}they let them live on to have piglets or{send them}for{slaughter.
